nice_flowery_sentence: With the holiday season upon us, our festive celebrations tend to be centred around food. The trick to enjoying your favourite foods while avoiding overindulgence is to load yourself with a healthy dose of tea that aids in digestion while keeping you hydrated! Enjoy Gryphon Tea’s Yuzu Kukicha, a bright green tea blend of fresh yuzu and citrus peel together with Pomegranate Ruby, a white tea flavoured with rose and magnolia. What's inside: Each Christmas bundle consist of 50 grams of Yuzu Kukicha and 50 grams of Fruit Symphony tied together in a cute little ribbon with a gift tag

We know how hard it is to drag ourselves up in the morning. Awaken your senses with Gryphon Tea’s Violeto, a black tea married with molten dark chocolate and exotic wild violets. Rejuvenate your mind and body with Morning Dew, a green tea exuding a sweet fresh scent of flowers and ripened berries.

Get inspired to start the day strong with a cup of invigorating tea. Served with a healthy breakfast, it is all you need to roll out of bed and rock the day! What's inside: Each Christmas bundle consist of 50 grams of Violeto and 50 grams of Morning Dew tied together in a cute little ribbon with a gift tag!

nice_flowery_sentence: The perfect brew for any occasion, it is hard to go wrong with a classic tea selection! What's inside: Each Christmas bundle consist of 50 grams of Earl Grey Classic and 50 grams of French Vanilla Sencha tied together in a cute little ribbon with a gift tag!

name: The Night Elves (Duo Set)
nice_flowery_sentence: Recovering from the repercussion of late night parties and festive indulgences can be quite a drag, especially if they disrupt your regular sleeping pattern. Calm your senses and enjoy a soothing cup of Fruit Symphony tea, a harmonious blend of fruits with the light sweetness of herbs. Together with Pastisan, a caffeine-free tea blended with apples, cardamon, safflower, lemongrass and mint. This duo is the perfect healthy antidote to help bring sound sleep back into your life. What's inside: Each Christmas bundle consist of 50 grams of Fruit Symphony and 50 grams of Pastisan tied together in a cute little ribbon with a gift tag!
